Interface TaskObserver

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Observer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LogProgress, TaskProgress, TaskProgressFX

    public interface TaskObserver
extends Observer
    Defines the Observer of a Task.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Nicolas Filotto (nicolas.filotto@gmail.com)
